snippet: Maria Sharapova reached the third round by beating Mariana Duque-Marino. Victoria Azarenka set up a match against Serena Williams. Milos Raonic served nine aces and broke Juan Monaco’s serve twice.
abstract: Maria Sharapova beats Mariana Duque-Marino in second round of Madrid Open; other tennis scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova reached the third round by beating Mariana Duque-Marino. Victoria Azarenka set up a match against Serena Williams. Milos Raonic served nine aces and broke Juan Monaco’s serve twice.

headline.main: Sharapova, Azarenka and Raonic Advance at Madrid Open
